actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: For the relief of Michael Patrick McNamara and Thomas Parnell McNamara, Jr.

summary.text: Entitles two named Federal employees to: (1) competitive status; (2) have their appointments converted to unconditional career appointments; and (3) have their positions converted to Deputy U.S. Marshall. Provides for their retirement from Federal service.

titles.title: For the relief of Michael Patrick McNamara and Thomas Parnell McNamara, Jr.
